attributes.action: Call a vote of no confidence
attributes.additional_details: The government arent fit to run this country and are dangerously close to becoming a dictatorship.
attributes.background: Many people believe the current government are unfit to continue in office. Call a vote of no confidence so we can vote for who we believe is best suited to run this country.

rejection.details:
We also can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for a vote of no confidence in the Government. This is set out in the Committee's standards: https://petition.parliament.uk/help

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.

You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
